Package com.niton.themes.base

Class Theme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.niton.themes.base.Theme
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResizeableTheme
    public abstract class Theme
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Theme Class.
    A theme defines the custom rendering of a frame
    Version:
    2018-08-08
    Author:
    Nils Brugger

      abstract java.awt.Rectangle getContentSize()
      Description :
      This method should provide the area in which the content of the window will be.

      Description :
      This method needs to paint the background of the window and the border.

      • getCloseArea

        public abstract java.awt.Rectangle getCloseArea()
        Returns:
        the area in which the user needs to click to trigger the action on close

      • getMaximizeArea

        public abstract java.awt.Rectangle getMaximizeArea()
        Returns:
        the area in which the user needs to click to iconify the Window

      • getMinimizeArea

        public abstract java.awt.Rectangle getMinimizeArea()
        Returns:
        the area in which the user needs to click to make the frame

      • getContentSize

        public abstract java.awt.Rectangle getContentSize()
        Description :
        This method should provide the area in which the content of the window will be.
        it HAS TO BE smaller than the parameter because the outer areas are the border for your theme
        Returns:
        the area for the content

      • paint

        public abstract void paint​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Description :
        This method needs to paint the background of the window and the border.
        The painting of the sub components doesn't needs to be done.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics to paint on
